heading: In this Scheme “Principal Scheme” means the Student Grant Scheme
text_raw:
3. 

In this Scheme “Principal Scheme” means the Student Grant Scheme 

2023 (S.I. No. 94 of 2023).

title: 16 of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011) (as adapted by the Further
heading: 4. Schedule 4 of the Principal Scheme is amended by substituting for
text_raw:
4. Schedule 4 of the Principal Scheme is amended by substituting for 

Table 2 the following: 

“Table 2 

Student Contribution Element 

Full (100%) grant in respect of the 
student contribution charge 

Part (50%) grant in respect of the 
student contribution charge 

Part €500 grant in respect of the 
student contribution charge 

Rate 

€2,000 

€1,000 

€500 

” 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 8th December, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [613] 3

title: 16 of the Student Support Act 2011 (No. 4 of 2011) (as adapted by the Further
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The purpose of this Scheme is to amend the Student Grant Scheme 2023 to 
provide for changes to the rate of the Student Contribution Element and the 
Postgraduate Fee Contribution. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6 [613]
